title: In what ways do humans influence the quality of drinking water? - Quora

response.answer_text: -build and use latrines, preventing fecal contamination of drinking water sources e.g. ground or river water. Building latrines but not used by the population who considers pooping behind a bush much easier won’t work. -prevent chemical contamination of the drinking water, so many have been seen unfortunately leading to massive medical catastrophes, like the Flint water contamination by lead leeching for old lead plumbing after for budgetary reasons they decided to use acid river water as their main water supply causing an epidemic of children with lead poisoning and serious neurological damage; deathly arsenic poisoning because of high arsenic content of ground water in many well in the Indian subcontinent, the spilling of organic mercury in the Minamata Bay causing contamination of fish in the bay area, which poisoned people who ate these fish, etc. etc.
